name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dominate the future with McLaren Cyberpunk Neon City live wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Futuristic visuals, shortcuts, time, and date—light up your browser today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into a cyberpunk masterpiece with the "McLaren Cyberpunk Neon City" Chrome extension. Featuring a stunning live wallpaper of a sleek McLaren set against the glowing neon lights of a futuristic cityscape, this extension delivers a bold and electrifying aesthetic. Perfect for car enthusiasts and fans of cyberpunk culture, it’s a visual experience that turns every new tab into a glimpse of the future.

Beyond its captivating design, this extension offers powerful tools to enhance your daily browsing. Instantly access your favorite websites with convenient shortcuts designed to save you time. Stay in control of your schedule with an integrated display of the current date and time, blending seamlessly into the vibrant neon backdrop.

"McLaren Cyberpunk Neon City" is more than just a live wallpaper—it’s a celebration of innovation, speed, and style. Add this extension to your Chrome browser now and let the energy of a neon-drenched cyberpunk world redefine your digital experience!
